inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientEventlogInfoV2_CL
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by MachineName, TimeCreated
| project-reorder CollectionTime desc
| project-reorder MachineName, Message asc 
| project-rename EventID=Id_
| where EventID == 6008
| distinct MachineName
| sort by MachineName asc 
|summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UNEXPECTED SHUTDOWNS | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientBitlockerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OSDisk_ProtectionStatus == 0
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, OSDisk_DriveLetter, OSDisk_EncryptionPercentage, OSDisk_VolumeStatus, OSDisk_ProtectionStatus, OSDisk_CapacityGB,  OSDisk_KeyProtector
| sort by Computer asc  
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT BITLOCKER | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientGroupPolicyRefreshV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where GPLastRefresh > ago(-7d)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, GPLastRefreshDays, GPLastRefresh
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"LAST GROUP POLICY REFRESH MORE THAN 7 DAYS AGO | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientComputerInfoV2_CL 
| extend OsUpTime = todynamic(OsUptime)
| mv-expand OsUptime
| where toint(OsUpTime.Days) > 7
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, OsUptime_Days=toint(OsUpTime.Days), CollectionTime
| sort by OsUptime_Days desc
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"NO RESTART MORE THAN 7 DAYS DAY | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientAntivirusV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where PrimaryAntivirusProduct !contains "Defender"
| project Computer, CollectionTime, PrimaryAntivirusProduct, PrimaryAntivirusEXE, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateCode, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateTimestamp, PrimaryAntivirusRealTimeStatus, PrimaryAntivirusDefinitionStatus,Alternative1AntivirusProduct, Alternative1AntivirusEXE, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateCode, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateTimestamp
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"OTHER PRIMARY ANTIVIRUS (SECURITY CENTER) | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientDefenderAvV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ( (AMRunningMode == "Not running") or 
          (parse_version(AMProductVersion) < parse_version("4.18.2203") ) or 
          (MPComputerStatusFound == false) or (MPPreferenceFound == false) or
          (RealTimeProtectionEnabled == false) or
          (AntivirusSignatureAge > 7) or (AntispywareSignatureAge > 7) or (NISSignatureAge > 7) or
          (AMRunningMode == "EDR Block Mode") or (AMRunningMode == "Passive Mode") or
          (AntispywareEnabled == false) or
         ( (TamperProtectionSource != "ATP") and (TamperProtectionSource != "Intune") ) or (IsTamperProtected == false)
        )
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, MPComputerStatusFound, MPPreferenceFound, AMEngineVersion, AMProductVersion, AMRunningMode, AMServiceEnabled, AMServiceVersion, AntispywareEnabled, AntispywareSignatureAge, AntispywareSignatureLastUpdated, AntispywareSignatureVersion, AntivirusEnabled, AntivirusSignatureAge, AntivirusSignatureLastUpdated, AntivirusSignatureVersion, BehaviorMonitorEnabled, DefenderSignaturesOutOfDate, DisableAutoExclusions, DisableBehaviorMonitoring, DisableRealtimeMonitoring, DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan, DisableScanningNetworkFiles, DisableScriptScanning, EnableControlledFolderAccess, EnableNetworkProtection,    FullScanAge, IoavProtectionEnabled, IsTamperProtected, IsVirtualMachine, MAPSReporting, NISEnabled, NISEngineVersion, NISSignatureAge, NISSignatureLastUpdated, NISSignatureVersion, OnAccessProtectionEnabled, ProductStatus, PUAProtection, QuickScanAge, RealTimeProtectionEnabled, RealTimeScanDirection, RebootRequired, ScanAvgCPULoadFactor, SignatureUpdateCatchupInterval, SignatureUpdateInterval, SubmitSamplesConsent, TamperProtectionSource 
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT DEFENDER AV | CLIENTS | COUNT ","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL 
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer, Profile
| where Enabled != 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction != 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction != 2     // 2=Allow
| where AllowInboundRules != 1         // 1=True
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < ago(40d)
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()

","size":0,"title":"PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < ago(40d)
| where UpdateClassification notcontains "Drivers"
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"PENDING UPDATES, NO DRV, OLDER THAN 40 DAYS | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdateLastResultsV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastInstallationSuccessDate < ago(40d)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, LastInstallationSuccessDate, LastSearchSuccessDate, CollectionTime
| sort by Computer asc
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"LAST WINDOWS UPDATE MORE THAN 40 DAYS AGO | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let LAPS_Target = "6.2.0.0";
InvClientLAPSInfoV2_CL
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer
| where ComputerFqdn !contains ".workgroup"
| where (parse_version(LAPSVersion) < parse_version(LAPS_Target)) or (LAPSVersion == "")
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT LAPS | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend enableautomaticupdates_ = column_ifexists("enableautomaticupdates", 0)
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "not_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "not_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "not_found")
| extend OfficeInstallationPath_ = column_ifexists("InstallationPath", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannel_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannel", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannelName_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannelName", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateEnabled_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateEnabled", "not_found")
| extend VersionToReport_ = column_ifexists("VersionToReport", "not_found")
| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "not_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds_ contains "O365"
| where (OfficeUpdateEnabled_ == "False") or (enableautomaticupdates_ == 0) 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UPDATING O365 OFFICE NOT ENABLED | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend enableautomaticupdates_ = column_ifexists("enableautomaticupdates", 0)
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "not_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "not_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "not_found")
| extend OfficeInstallationPath_ = column_ifexists("InstallationPath", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannel_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannel", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannelName_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannelName", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateEnabled_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateEnabled", "not_found")
| extend VersionToReport_ = column_ifexists("VersionToReport", "not_found")
| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "not_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds_ contains "O365"
| where (OfficeUpdateChannel_ notcontains "492350f6-3a01-4f97-b9c0-c7c6ddf67d60") and (OfficeUpdateChannel_ notcontains "55336b82-a18d-4dd6-b5f6-9e5095c314a6") // 492350f6-3a01-4f97-b9c0-c7c6ddf67d60 = Current channel, 55336b82-a18d-4dd6-b5f6-9e5095c314a6 = monthly enterprise channel
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT UPDATE CHANNEL O365 OFFICE | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"ONACCESSPROTECTION DISABLED DEFENDER AV | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientDefenderAvV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where (AntispywareEnabled == false)
